property.name: description
property.value: This accessor collects map data from its input and aggregates the results in a map repository in local memory. When it receives a trigger input it sends the contents of its repository on its output port. When it receives a clear input it empties its repository.

property.name: report (port)
property.value: Input that triggers a report of the map repo contents.

property.name: clear (port)
property.value: Input that triggers a reset of the repository's data.

property.name: repoData (port)
property.value: MapSchema structured map data from the repository.
